::Zardus::

Zardus recieves Shokaract's transmission, smiling to himself. This 
was better than he had imagined. With a whole new group, especially 
one with a gestalt, the Alliance could become quite alot stronger..

"Yes," he replies over the comm-link, "We can talk more about the 
terms later, after the battle. Be careful if you're coming here. 
There's a battle and the shields are up. I'll set the defences to not 
fire on you."

Zardus looks around, realizing that there were quite alot of bots 
firing at Koj and Inu, something that wasn't really neccessary. He 
taps a few buttons, putting the Mafia on friend for now.

"Alliance bots," he says into his comm-link, "The Mafia is coming 
here, don't fire at them. They seemed to have changed their minds 
from war to peace."

He walks over to Squizzy, firing a few more shots at Koj. "Is the lab 
ready for the base to be moved? As soon as this battle's over, we 
need to move out."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Shokaract aproaches the Alliance's base in beast mode.
> 
> Shokaract: Leader of the Alliance, we come in peace. We wish to 
form a union with you instead of fighting, would you like to discuss 
this further, Alliance leader?...
